Your earnings

You have earned {{ final_payoff }} in this experiment.

Getting your payment

To send you your payment, we need your name, your IBAN, and—if you are not using an Austrian or German bank account—your BIC.

Your bank details are collected and processed by the VCEE Laboratory and not by the experimenter. Thus, the data collected during the experiment and your bank details are kept separated at all times. Therefore, your behavior in the experiment cannot be linked to you.

How your bank details are processed

To process your payment, we will share your bank details with the Accounting and Finance Service of the University of Vienna. We will not share it with anyone else, including the experimenter.

Security

Due to security reasons, we will not be able to change your bank details after you have submitted them. Thus, we ask you to make sure the information you enter is correct. In particular, please write your name as it is written in your bank account and on the ORSEE platform you signed up with.

This name needs to match the name you use on your bank account and on the ORSEE recruitment platform.
Include the country identifier.
